data.eml:eml: A new species of Bembidion Latrielle 1802 from the Ozarks, with a review of the North American species of subgenus Trichoplataphus Netolitzky 1914 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Bembidiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hildebrandt, Drew A., Maddison, David R. (2011): A new species of Bembidion Latrielle 1802 from the Ozarks, with a review of the North American species of subgenus Trichoplataphus Netolitzky 1914 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Bembidiini). ZooKeys 147: 261-275, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.147.1872, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.147.1872
